website_summaries.verdict: Most users agreed that the Skechers Skech-Flex 2.0 - Milwee provided the lightweight comfort that they needed for their workouts, walks, and errands. Other features that stood out to them were its fashion-forward design and relaxed fit. However, a handful of people griped about the large sizing and easily soaked sole. Overall, it was still considered an appropriate footgear for indoor workouts.
pros: A majority of consumers were impressed by the comfort that the Skechers Skech-Flex 2.0 - Milwee provided
Plenty of buyers praised its lightweight nature
Many purchasers admired the stylish aesthetics of the footwear
Numerous wearers liked its relaxed fit
Fitness enthusiasts enjoyed using the shoe for workouts, walks, and post-training errands
People suffering from foot conditions such as bunion and neuropathy appreciated that the footgear delivered pain relief
A few testers noted that it had quality materials
cons: A significant number of critics complained about the trainer’s unusually big sizing
Various detractors scrutinized its soles for letting water seep in even on a slightly wet surface
Some naysayers found the arch support in this Skechers workout shoe to be lacking

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable well made shoes BUT......
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable well made casual shoes, but for me fatally flawed. The wide tread picks up small stones very quickly. Shingle/gravel is a real nuisance. I have a shingle drive and try as I might I cannot get to my car without picking up stones in the tread, which then uncomfortably click-click-click when walking on any firm surface. The stones (maybe up to half a dozen per shoe) are easily prised out on return but I would NEVER buy these wide tread shoes again !
customer_reviews.author: Shawshots

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with Sketchers
customer_reviews.text: I brought my first pair in the US while doing so much walking around the parks they were so good that's all I buy now gone are Nike or Adidas! Whether it's for me or the kids I always buy Sketchers light and comfy you can't go wrong with Sketchers they are like walking on clouds...so good I even brought my hobo his first pair just because on Prime day the price was so fantastic...Top tip if you see them for a fantastic low price buy them!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy. Only negative really is that they let water in really easy, the slightest shower and you end up with wet feet.
customer_reviews.author: JohnF

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I found these very comfortable and just wide enough. Some rivals have a tighter fit but these are just short of a wide fit so for me they are absolutely perfect. I was so pleased i ordered another one in a different colour
customer_reviews.author: Jagtar Rai

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very light & comfy just like slippers great for my bad knees cushions your joints highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: andrew whyte

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comfortable and light track nerd
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent trainers. Very light and comfortable. I have a wide foot and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ivor Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair from Sketchers previously so replaced nicely with these ones.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable light and smart
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe light as a feather my husband loves them
customer_reviews.author: Mrs L M Marshall

customer_reviews.title: A very happy shopper
customer_reviews.text: Super quick delivery time, the trainers look great and the fit is spot on. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These Skechers are really smart looking and are really comfortable to wear, 5 stars!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and reasonably priced,my own fault about the size.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit for someone who needs a wider fit shoe
customer_reviews.author: andy m

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at last
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit, wonderful to be able to get large size. Have now purchased another pair so pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: MRS  JUDITH A THORNDIKE

customer_reviews.title: Happy days
customer_reviews.text: Happy day I love them. Size is great and so comfortable and a great price. I would buy again no problem
customer_reviews.author: Douglas S.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful skechers
customer_reviews.text: excellent shoes, very comfortable. delivery excellent and from ordering to delivering brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: bill

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's 52619 Multisport Outdoor Shoes
product_meta.description: These men's Skech-Flex 2.0 sneakers from Skechers feature nearly one piece skech knit mesh fabric upper. Lace up athletic training sneaker with stitching accents. Air cooled memory foam insole. These sneakers also feature engineered mesh fabric panels for cooling effect, stability weave panels at toe, sides and heel along with smooth synthetic detail at laces for added durability. These sneakers come with Skech-Flex 2.0 highly flexible shock absorbing lightweight outsole, articulated midsole and outsole design for maximum flexibility. Rubber traction outsole ideal for training activities and 1 1/4 inch built in heel.
